languages.text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

traits.locale_text: Kills the target that has <50% Wounds. On a successful TOU Save (-50), deals Rending Damage instead. Deals the same amount of Rending Damage if the target has >50% Wounds. Purges {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodstained Ally{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained Enemy{/g}. Special: If the target has >3 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Fading{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained Enemy{/g}, the threshold changes to <90% Wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If that target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: the target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test, if it has less than 90% wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If that target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: the target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test, if it has less than 90% wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Красная фаза (Кровь).
Мощный удар мечом, который моментально убивает цель, у которой <50% ХП (TOU Save -50). При несоответствии уровня ХП или при успешном спасброске наносит большой Rending урон. Снимает стаки Bloodsoaked.
Особое свойство: если у цели >3 стаков Bloodsoaked или Fading, порог летального урона увеличивается до 90% ХП.

languages.text: Неумирающий Император наносит цели раздирающий урон и снимает с нее все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Если у цели остается меньше 50% здоровья, она совершает проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −50 и в случае провала немедленно погибает. Особое свойство: если на цель действует 3 и более уровней {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающего духа{/g} или 3 и более уровней {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}, она выполняет проверку, если у нее остается менее 90% здоровья.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

traits.locale_text: Неумирающий Император наносит цели раздирающий урон и снимает с нее все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Если у цели остается меньше 50% здоровья, она совершает проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −50 и в случае провала немедленно погибает. Особое свойство: если на цель действует 3 и более уровней {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающего духа{/g} или 3 и более уровней {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}, она выполняет проверку, если у нее остается менее 90% здоровья.

Неумирающий Император наносит цели раздирающий урон и снимает с нее все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Если у цели остается меньше 50% здоровья, она совершает проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −50 и в случае провала немедленно погибает. Особое свойство: если на цель действует 3 и более уровней {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающего духа{/g} или 3 и более уровней {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}, она выполняет проверку, если у нее остается менее 90% здоровья.

languages.text: El Emperador Inmortal causa daño acerado al objetivo y elimina todas sus acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} y {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Si el objetivo tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −50 o de lo contrario morirá en el acto. Especial: un objetivo con al menos 3 acumulaciones de {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}alma evanescente{/g} o al menos 3 acumulaciones de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} deberá superar esa prueba si tiene menos del 90 % de sus heridas.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

traits.locale_text: El Emperador Inmortal causa daño acerado al objetivo y elimina todas sus acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} y {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Si el objetivo tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −50 o de lo contrario morirá en el acto. Especial: un objetivo con al menos 3 acumulaciones de {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}alma evanescente{/g} o al menos 3 acumulaciones de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} deberá superar esa prueba si tiene menos del 90 % de sus heridas.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝は対象に裂傷ダメージ与え、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}と {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。対象の傷が50%以下の場合、-50のペナルティを伴う耐久力抵抗判定に合格しなければ即座に死亡する。 特別：{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}消える魂{/g}が3スタック以上、または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}が3スタック以上ある対象は、その傷が90%未満であればそのテストに合格しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝は対象に裂傷ダメージ与え、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}と {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。対象の傷が50%以下の場合、-50のペナルティを伴う耐久力抵抗判定に合格しなければ即座に死亡する。 特別：{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}消える魂{/g}が3スタック以上、または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}が3スタック以上ある対象は、その傷が90%未満であればそのテストに合格しなければならない。

languages.text: 不死神皇对目标造成撕裂伤害，同时移除目标所有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}与{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}层数。如果目标的生命值低于50%，则需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-50减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会立刻死亡。 特殊效果：如果目标至少拥有3层{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}灵魂凋零{/g}或3层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果，则即死检定的阈值提高至90%生命值，未能通过检定会立刻死亡。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

traits.locale_text: 不死神皇对目标造成撕裂伤害，同时移除目标所有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}与{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}层数。如果目标的生命值低于50%，则需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-50减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会立刻死亡。 特殊效果：如果目标至少拥有3层{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}灵魂凋零{/g}或3层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果，则即死检定的阈值提高至90%生命值，未能通过检定会立刻死亡。

languages.text: Der Todlose Imperator fügt dem Ziel rüstungsbrechenden Schaden zu und entfernt alle {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}- und {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}-Stapel. Hat das Ziel weniger als 50 % Wunden, stirbt es im Falle einer misslungenen Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit sofort.Spezial: Ein Ziel mit 3 oder mehr Stapeln {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Schwindende Seele{/g} oder 3 oder mehr Stapeln {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g} muss diese Probe bestehen, wenn es weniger als 90 % Wunden hat.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose Imperator fügt dem Ziel rüstungsbrechenden Schaden zu und entfernt alle {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}- und {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}-Stapel. Hat das Ziel weniger als 50 % Wunden, stirbt es im Falle einer misslungenen Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit sofort.Spezial: Ein Ziel mit 3 oder mehr Stapeln {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Schwindende Seele{/g} oder 3 oder mehr Stapeln {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g} muss diese Probe bestehen, wenn es weniger als 90 % Wunden hat.

languages.text: L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts de lacération à la cible et dissipe tous ses cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Si la cible dispose de moins de 50 % de ses blessures, elle doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de −50. En cas d'échec, elle meurt instantanément. Spécial : une cible affectée par au moins 3 cumuls d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g} ou de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} doit réussir ce même test si elle dispose de moins de 90 % de ses blessures.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.

traits.locale_text: L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts perforants à la cible et dissipe tous ses cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Si la cible dispose de moins de 50 % de ses blessures, elle doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -50. En cas d'échec, elle meurt instantanément. Spécial : une cible affectée par au moins 3 cumuls d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g} ou de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} doit réussir ce même test si elle dispose de moins de 90 % de ses blessures.

L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts perforants à la cible et dissipe tous ses cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Si la cible dispose de moins de 50 % de ses blessures, elle doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -50. En cas d'échec, elle meurt instantanément. Spécial : une cible affectée par au moins 3 cumuls d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g} ou de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} doit réussir ce même test si elle dispose de moins de 90 % de ses blessures.

languages.text: Ölmeyen İmparator, hedefe yırtma hasarı verir ve hedefin üzerindeki tüm {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} ve {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} birikimlerini kaldırır. Hedefin sağlık puanları %50'nin altındaysa hedef, −50 ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde anında ölür. Özel: 3 veya daha fazla {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}solan ruh{/g} ya da {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} birikimine sahip bir hedef, %90'dan daha az sağlık puanına sahipse bu testten geçmek zorundadır.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals rending damage to the target and removes all the stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from it. If the target has less than 50% wounds, it must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −50 penalty or immediately die. Special: a target with 3 or more stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} or 3 or more stacks of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} must pass that test if it has less than 90% wounds.
